description: Provides a SQL Server instance resource to create read-only database instances.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ChargeType.description: Pay type of the SQL Server instance. For now, only `POSTPAID_BY_HOUR` is valid.

ForceUpgrade.description: Indicate that the master instance upgrade or not. `true` for upgrading the master SQL Server instance to cluster type by force. Default is false. Note: this is not supported with `DUAL`(ha_type), `2017`(engine_version) master SQL Server instance, for it will cause ha_type of the master SQL Server instance change.

MasterInstanceId.description: Indicates the master instance ID of recovery instances.

Memory.description: Memory size (in GB). Allowed value must be larger than `memory` that data source `tencentcloud_sqlserver_specinfos` provides.

Name.description: Name of the SQL Server instance.

ReadonlyGroupId.description: ID of the readonly group that this instance belongs to. When `readonly_group_type` set value `3`, it must be set with valid value.

ReadonlyGroupType.description: Type of readonly group. Valid values: `1`, `3`. `1` for one auto-assigned readonly instance per one readonly group, `2` for creating new readonly group, `3` for all exist readonly instances stay in the exist readonly group. For now, only `1` and `3` are supported.

SecurityGroups.description: Security group bound to the instance.

Storage.description: Disk size (in GB). Allowed value must be a multiple of 10. The storage must be set with the limit of `storage_min` and `storage_max` which data source `tencentcloud_sqlserver_specinfos` provides.

Tags.description: The tags of the SQL Server.
